attributes.action: Extend the theory test deadlines if tests cannot be booked.
attributes.additional_details:
It's so unfair that learners are unable to get 1 driving test without a 6-7 month wait let alone another if they fail, if a learner is unfortunate enough to fail the test dates just aren't there due to the theory test expiry dates. There should be exemptions for example if a test is booked just because the theory is running out. If a Learner can prove regular lessons it's so unfair on them at this 
particular time.
attributes.background: If learner drivers can provide very they have been having regular driving lessons and they fail a test they should have the opportunity to extend the theory test date as driving tests are very hard to come by.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700314
